channel.title: 2022/23 on COMP2221 – Functional Programming
channel.description: Recent content in 2022/23 on COMP2221 – Functional Programming

item.title: Slides & Recordings
item.description: Lecture slides and video links # As the course progresses, I’ll add the annotated slides and live code examples, along with links to the videos (accessible with a Durham account) to this page. 2023-01-09: Slides, video, code We got most of the way through the slides, and then did some live examples. We defined and composed some very simple functions and saw a bit of Haskell syntax that we will consider in more detail as the course progresses.
